DOC.brief_summary: We will develop a new measure of patient engagement/activation specific to the context of diabetes self-care
DOC.brief_title: Measuring Patient Engagement in Diabetes Care
DOC.criteria: 1. Patient is age 21 and older 2. Patient is English speaking 3. Patient has been diagnosed with Type II Diabetes by a health care provider 1. Severe, uncorrectable vision 2. Hearing impairments 3. Cognitive impairment
